subject: Move Themes from Style tab to Presets tab
body:
Themes are presets (predefined color schemes), so grouping them with
other presets creates a logical workflow: Layout → Themes → Complete Designs.

- Move Themes section from StyleTab to TemplatesTab
- Position between Layout and Complete Designs sections
- Update App.jsx to pass theme props to TemplatesTab
- Clean up unused props from StyleTab

https://claude.ai/code/session_01UGQ1gnJBpkhWY5hT3GXvNF
title: Move Themes from Style tab to Presets tab
